property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
actionScript
property.value: toggleComponentContent(this, 'plan_audits_summary', '.collapsible', 'Show @{lookupResults.size() GT 7 ? '5' : (lookupResults.size() - 2)} additional Plan Audit(s)', 'Hide @{lookupResults.size() GT 7 ? '5' : (lookupResults.size() - 2)} additional Plan Audit(s)');

property.name: messageText
property.value: The Audit feature is disabled for non-students. We are unable to run a degree audit for you at this time.

bean.p:messageText: Select your campus and intended degree program from the dropdown menu below.
[0] in the degree program list for audit.

property.name: disabled
property.value: @{(#form.planExists EQ false) OR (#form.planAudit.campusParam EQ '306' AND #form.planAudit.programParamSeattle EQ 'default') OR (#form.planAudit.campusParam EQ '310' AND #form.planAudit.programParamBothell EQ 'default') OR (#form.planAudit.campusParam EQ '323' AND #form.planAudit.programParamTacoma EQ 'default')}

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:messageText: You have no planned courses available to audit. [0] and add them to your plan.

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:headerText: How to Use Plan Audit for Academic Planning
Will your plan meet your program requirements?

property.name: messageText
property.value: Plan Audit compares planned courses and your academic record with your requirements to give you an idea of what will be needed to complete your degree.[br/][br/]This Audit is meant as a planning tool and is not an official evaluation of academic progress. Work with your adviser to ensure that your planned courses will meet your degree or program requirements.

bean.p:headerText: What do you need to do?

property.name: messageText
property.value: Make sure that you have added courses to your plan for future quarters, then select your program from the menu above and run a Plan Audit to see if you are on the right track.

property.name: messageText
property.value: To run your Plan Audit, MyPlan needs more information for the following course(s)

bean.p:replacement: @{#form.planAudit.cleanList.size() GT 0 ? ' ' : 'We are unable to generate a Plan Audit. [0]'}

@{T(org.kuali.student.myplan.plan.util.AtpHelper).getUserSessionHelper().getFirstName(T(org.kuali.student.myplan.plan.util.AtpHelper).getUserSessionHelper().getStudentId())} chose the following course options for their Plan Audit:

property.name: messageText
property.value: We are unable to generate a Plan Audit because more information is needed from @{T(org.kuali.student.myplan.plan.util.AtpHelper).getUserSessionHelper().getStudentName( )}. [0]

property.name: messageText
property.value: @{T(org.kuali.student.myplan.plan.util.AtpHelper).getUserSessionHelper().getStudentName()} must provide more details about this course.

bean.p:messageText: The following course(s) are not included in the Plan Audit because they may not be offered in the quarter planned.
